meanings.definition: A device that accelerates particles to high speeds and causes them to collide.
meanings.sent1: Scientists use colliders to study tiny particles.
meanings.sent2: The colliders at the lab are used for important experiments.
meanings.sent3: The colliders decided to have a race to see who could collide first.
meanings.sent4: In the world of particle physics, colliders are like busy intersections where particles crash into each other.
meanings.sent5: The loud collision from the colliders echoed through the laboratory.
